statements: SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, political_opinion FROM Influencers WHERE political_opinion = 'Conservative';
SELECT influencer_name FROM Influencers ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE follower_count > 1000 ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM Influencers WHERE political_opinion = 'Conservative' ORDER BY follower_count DESC, influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, political_opinion FROM Influencers WHERE follower_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, follower_count, political_opinion FROM Influencers ORDER BY follower_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count AS 'Followers', political_opinion AS 'Political_View' FROM Influencers WHERE political_opinion IN ('Liberal', 'Neutral') ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM opinions WHERE influencer_id=1
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE political_affiliation='Conservative' ORDER BY followers DESC
SELECT id, name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 1000
SELECT * FROM opinions WHERE opinion_text LIKE '%climate change%'
SELECT name, followers, political_affiliation FROM influencers WHERE political_affiliation='Liberal'
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE political_affiliation = 'Conservative';
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT influencers.name, opinions.opinion_text FROM influencers JOIN opinions ON influencers.id = opinions.influencer_id WHERE opinions.likes > 100 ORDER BY opinions.date_posted DESC;
SELECT influencers.name, SUM(opinions.likes) AS total_likes FROM influencers JOIN opinions ON influencers.id = opinions.influencer_id GROUP BY influencers.name;
SELECT * FROM opinions WHERE date_posted > '2022-01-01' AND date_posted < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, political_bias FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 500;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, political_bias FROM influencers WHERE political_bias = 'Conservative' ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE political_affiliation='Liberal';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 100000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, political_affiliation FROM influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.influencer_id = posts.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE political_affiliation = 'Conservative' ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts INNER JOIN influencers ON posts.influencer_id = influencers.influencer_id WHERE influencers.influencer_name = 'John Smith';

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, COUNT(likes.like_id) AS total_likes FROM influencers LEFT JOIN posts ON influencers.influencer_id = posts.influencer_id LEFT JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id GROUP BY influencers.influencer_name ORDER BY total_likes DESC;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, COUNT(comments.comment_id) AS total_comments FROM influencers LEFT JOIN posts ON influencers.influencer_id = posts.influencer_id LEFT JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY influencers.influencer_name ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT id, name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE avg_likes > 1000;
SELECT follower_name, follow_date FROM Followers ORDER BY follow_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_comments FROM Comments GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT political_leaning FROM Influencers WHERE political_leaning IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, followers, avg_likes FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT political_leaning, name FROM Influencers WHERE political_leaning = 'Liberal' OR political_leaning = 'Conservative';
SELECT post_content, likes, shares FROM Posts WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 50;
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text FROM Comments WHERE LENGTH(comment_text) > 50;
SELECT follower_name, follow_date FROM Followers ORDER BY follow_date DESC;
